title: can't include gazebo/gazebo.hh any more with the upgrade 6.3=>6.4

content.raw:
I change nothing in my code but this morning, my project is giving me this error : 

gazebo/gazebo.hh: No such file or directory
 #include <gazebo/gazebo.hh>
                            ^

in my  /var/log/dpkg.log:

2015-10-20 09:18:20 upgrade libgazebo6-dev:amd64 6.3.0-1~trusty 6.4.0-1~trusty
2015-10-20 09:18:21 upgrade gazebo6-plugin-base:amd64 6.3.0-1~trusty 6.4.0-1~trusty
2015-10-20 09:18:22 upgrade gazebo6:amd64 6.3.0-1~trusty 6.4.0-1~trusty
2015-10-20 09:18:23 upgrade gazebo6-common:all 6.3.0-1~trusty 6.4.0-1~trusty
2015-10-20 09:18:26 upgrade libgazebo6:amd64 6.3.0-1~trusty 6.4.0-1~trusty
content.html:
I change nothing in my code but this morning, my project is giving me this error :

gazebo/gazebo.hh: No such file or directory #include <gazebo/gazebo.hh> ^

in my /var/log/dpkg.log:

2015-10-20 09:18:20 upgrade libgazebo6-dev:amd64 6.3.0-1~trusty 6.4.0-1~trusty 2015-10-20 09:18:21 upgrade gazebo6-plugin-base:amd64 6.3.0-1~trusty 6.4.0-1~trusty 2015-10-20 09:18:22 upgrade gazebo6:amd64 6.3.0-1~trusty 6.4.0-1~trusty 2015-10-20 09:18:23 upgrade gazebo6-common:all 6.3.0-1~trusty 6.4.0-1~trusty 2015-10-20 09:18:26 upgrade libgazebo6:amd64 6.3.0-1~trusty 6.4.0-1~trusty
